text:
Sharjah Commerce and Tourism Development Authority invites all to celebrate Eid in Sharjah Published on : Thursday, July 2, 2015
Sharjah Commerce and Tourism Development Authority (SCTDA) invites you to enjoy Ramadan and celebrate Eid in the Emirate of Sharjah.
Eid is a time of spiritual reflection and worship for Muslims across the world. To facilitate with the best of services, SCTDA exclusively prepares to welcome people to its elaborately decorated Ramadan tents and Eid Fairs. Ramadan tents and Eid Fairs offer you the opportunity to experience the historic culture of this fascinating Emirate, serving as a testament to Sharjah’s rich cultural heritage.
SCTDA – Sharjah Commerce and Tourism Development Authority invites you to join in at the Expo Centre Sharjah from June 25th till July 28th. With an outstanding culinary show and generosity, the city hosts Ramadan tents and Eid Fairs for Muslims and non-Muslims alike where people can taste traditional Ramadan feasts and Eid specialties with friends and family. Al Qasba and Al Majaz Waterfront offer an array of restaurants in Sharjah with spectacular Arabian ambiance and highlights Islamic heritage to reflect the spirit of the Holy Month of Ramadan.
The Ramadan and Eid Fairs will continue till July 28, while the Sharjah Ramadan Festival events will continue at the Expo centre until July 31.
